name: Frogmonster
storyline: In a world, existing before and still, built through the powerful and cunning minds of the Creators, a new being emerges. The world, once flourishing with enriching creatures and plants, is changing rapidly and dangerously. Beasts, designed by a wicked and corrupt Creator, tear apart and threaten the creatures that still survive. You, the final hope from Melora, a naïve and endangered creator, will journey though the unraveling, unique lands, battle the mindless beasts, and revive the world that once was.
summary: Discover some of the most charming and challenging bosses in Frogmonster, a Metroidvania FPS adventure where you explore a lively world filled with creatures, bugs, and beasts.
